value.title: Tip: Change Title Text Dynamically in Power BI Visual
value.excerpt: This is a Quick Tip Video in the Power BI. Sometimes we have a requirement in which we need to set the Title of the visual based on some conditions. This video will help you to achieve that thing. We can easily apply the Conditional Formatting for Visual Headers.

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook

value.title: Answering your datamart questions

Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview#comparing-dataflows-to-datamarts

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy!
